name: TheFrontDesk
0:
”Alexa, ask The Front Desk”
”Housekeeping”
”I need two towels”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the front desk
des: Using The Front Desk hotel guests can request hotel amenities like towels, order food from Room Service or find out the location and hours of the hotel fitness center. Rather than calling the hotel switchboard ask The Front Desk on Alexa for what you need.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
